sections.text: Short title§ 1a - Public policy§ 1b - State Insurance Fund Corporation—Creation§ 1b-1 - State Insurance Fund Corporation—Authority and general powers§ 1b-2 - State Insurance Fund Corporation—Board of Directors§ 1b-3 - State Insurance Fund Corporation—Authority and obligations of the Board§ 1b-4 - State Insurance Fund Corporation—Duties and functions of the Administrator§ 1c - Medical-Industrial Council—Creation§ 2 - Workers and employees covered in this chapter§ 2-1 - Workers’ insurance policy for truck drivers§ 2-2 - Claim for accident or occupational disease by the truck driver§ 2-3 - Administrative penalty for undue filing and claims§ 2a - Benefits for employers performing manual labor§ 2b - Benefits for employers performing manual labor—Affidavit as to injuries§ 3 - Workers’ and employees’ rights§ 4 - Diseases of respiratory system§ 4a - Additional compensation§ 5 - Excepted cases of accidents§ 6 - Medical examination and treatment§ 7 - Reinstatement following disability§ 8 - Organization of Workers’ Compensation Services; Administrator of the State Insurance Fund; Industrial Commission§§ 8a, 8b - [Reclassified.]§ 9 - Delay in deciding cases§ 10 - Depositions and rogatory letters§ 11 - Appeal from the Administrator’s decision§ 12 - Repealed. Act July 1, 1996, No. 63, § 3, eff. July 1, 1996§ 13 - Proceedings for tutorship and declaration of heirs§ 14 - Record and report of all accidents§ 15 - Hospital records as admissible evidence§ 16 - Uninsured employers§ 17 - Accidents not included§ 18 - Penalty for failure to insure§ 19 - Compulsory insurance§ 20 - Employer to report all wages§ 21 - Exclusiveness of remedy§ 22 - Assignment of insurance§ 23 - Agreement between employers and workers, prohibited§ 24 - Schedule of classifications and premium rates§ 25 - Review of rates§ 26 - Insurance policies and taxation and collection of premiums§ 27 - Adjustment of premiums§ 28 - Annual statement of number of employees of the employer§ 28a - Exemption as to technical personnel protected by laws of other jurisdictions§ 29 - Register of workers and employees§ 30 - Public policy on investments§ 30a - Types of authorized investments§ 30b - Restrictions and miscellaneous authorizations§ 30c - Authorization to incur debt§ 30d - Depository§ 31 - Revision of premiums and rebates§ 32 - Third party liability; subrogation§ 33 - Cession of rights, prohibited§ 34 - Fines, and penalties, interest and surcharges covered into State Insurance Fund§ 35 - Pending litigation§ 36 - Attorneys or agents§ 37 - Industrial Commission and fund employees’ non-interest in claims§ 38 - Information shall be confidential; closing cases§ 39 - Definitions§ 40 - Advance appropriation by Government§ 41 - Savings provision covering Industrial Commission§ 42 - Expert assistance
